languages.text: {n}Офицер Кляйн, вытянувшись, гаркает:{/n} "Опознать погибшего не представляется возможным — лицо размозжено, а тело сильно изуродовано. Из-за множественных ран точную причину смерти определить сложно, но, предположительно, он погиб после того, как ему вспороли глотку, через которую и слили кровь. Внешних признаков мутаций не выявлено".

{n}Captain Klein snaps to attention:{/n} "Identifying the victim has proven impossible. His face has been smashed in and his body is badly maimed. There are too many wounds to determine the exact cause of death, but presumably he died after the killer slit his throat — that's how they drained his blood. No external signs of mutation were found."
languages.original_text: {n}Офицер Кляйн, вытянувшись, гаркает:{/n} "Опознать погибшего не представляется возможным — лицо размозжено, а тело сильно изуродовано. Внешних признаков мутаций не выявлено".

There are too many wounds to determine the exact cause of death, but presumably he died after the killer slit his throat — that's how they drained his blood. No external signs of mutation were discovered."

languages.text: {n}Le capitaine Klein se met au garde-à-vous :{/n} « Je n'ai pas réussi à identifier la victime. Son visage est enfoncé et son corps atrocement mutilé. Si ses blessures sont trop nombreuses pour déterminer la cause exacte de la mort, tout porte à croire qu'il s'est vidé de son sang après que le tueur lui a tranché la gorge. À part ça, je n'ai pas décelé de signes extérieurs de mutations. »
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Klein snaps to attention:{/n} "Identifying the victim has proven impossible. His face has been smashed in and his body is badly maimed. There are too many wounds to determine the exact cause of death, but presumably he died after the killer slit his throat — that's how they drained his blood. No external signs of mutation were found."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier Klein se met au garde-à-vous :{/n} « Je n'ai pas réussi à identifier la victime. Son visage est enfoncé et son corps atrocement mutilé. Si ses blessures sont trop nombreuses pour déterminer la cause exacte de la mort, tout porte à croire qu'il s'est vidé de son sang après que le tueur lui a tranché la gorge. À part ça, je n'ai pas décelé de signes extérieurs de mutations. »

languages.text: {n}El capitán Klein se cuadra.{/n} «Identificar a la víctima ha resultado imposible. Su rostro está destrozado, y su cuerpo, mutilado con esmero. Hay demasiadas heridas para determinar la causa concreta de la muerte, pero podemos suponer que murió cuando el asesino le cortó la garganta; así le drenaron la sangre. No hemos encontrado signos externos de mutación».
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Klein snaps to attention:{/n} "Identifying the victim has proven impossible. His face has been smashed in and his body is badly maimed. There are too many wounds to determine the exact cause of death, but presumably he died after the killer slit his throat — that's how they drained his blood. No external signs of mutation were found."

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial Klein se cuadra.{/n} «Identificar a la víctima ha resultado imposible. Su rostro está destrozado y su cuerpo, mutilado con esmero. Hay demasiadas heridas para determinar la causa concreta de la muerte, pero podemos suponer que murió cuando el asesino le cortó la garganta; así le drenaron la sangre. No hemos encontrado signos externos de mutación».

languages.text: {n}克莱因上尉在你面前立正站好。{/n}“目前没有办法确认受害者的身份，他的脸遭到了粉碎，躯体严重毁损。尸体上的伤口实在是太多了，无法确定确切死因，但受害者应该是被凶手割开喉咙之后死亡的，受害者浑身的血都被抽干了。目前并没有发现变异的外部迹象。”
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Klein snaps to attention:{/n} "Identifying the victim has proven impossible. His face has been smashed in and his body is badly maimed. There are too many wounds to determine the exact cause of death, but presumably he died after the killer slit his throat — that's how they drained his blood. No external signs of mutation were found."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因军官在你面前立正站好。{/n}“目前没有办法确认受害者的身份，他的脸遭到了粉碎，躯体严重毁损。尸体上的伤口实在是太多了，无法确定确切死因，但受害者应该是被凶手割开喉咙之后死亡的，受害者浑身的血都被抽干了。目前并没有发现变异的外部迹象。”

languages.text: {n}クライン中隊長がハッとした。{/n}「被害者の身元確認は不可能です。彼の顔は潰され、体はひどく傷ついています。傷が多すぎて正確な死因を特定できませんが、おそらくのどを切り裂かれて死んだのでしょう。そうやって、血を抜き取ったと思われます。外見上、変異の兆候は見られません」
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Klein snaps to attention:{/n} "Identifying the victim has proven impossible. His face has been smashed in and his body is badly maimed. There are too many wounds to determine the exact cause of death, but presumably he died after the killer slit his throat — that's how they drained his blood. No external signs of mutation were found."

traits.locale_text: {n}クライン巡査がハッとした。{/n}「被害者の身元確認は不可能です。彼の顔は潰され、体はひどく傷ついています。傷が多すぎて正確な死因を特定できませんが、おそらくのどを切り裂かれて死んだのでしょう。そうやって、血を抜き取ったと思われます。外部に怪我は見られません」

languages.text: {n}Captain Klein nimmt Haltung an:{/n} "Es hat sich als unmöglich erwiesen, das Opfer zu identifizieren. Sein Gesicht wurde ihm eingeschlagen und sein Körper ist übel entstellt. Es sind zu viele Wunden, um die genaue Todesursache festzustellen. Vermutlich ist er aber gestorben, nachdem ihm der Mörder die Kehle durchgeschnitten hat — so hat er ihn ausbluten lassen. Es wurden keine äußeren Zeichen einer Mutation gefunden."
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Klein snaps to attention:{/n} "Identifying the victim has proven impossible. His face has been smashed in and his body is badly maimed. There are too many wounds to determine the exact cause of death, but presumably he died after the killer slit his throat — that's how they drained his blood. No external signs of mutation were found."

traits.locale_text: {n}Offizier Klein nimmt Haltung an:{/n} "Es hat sich als unmöglich erwiesen, das Opfer zu identifizieren. Sein Gesicht wurde ihm eingeschlagen und sein Körper ist übel entstellt. Es sind zu viele Wunden, um die genaue Todesursache festzustellen. Vermutlich ist er aber gestorben, nachdem ihm der Mörder die Kehle durchgeschnitten hat — so hat er ihn ausbluten lassen. Es wurden keine äußeren Zeichen einer Mutation gefunden."

languages.text: {n}Komutan Klein dikkat kesiliyor.{/n} "Kurbanın kimliğinin belirlenmesi imkânsız. Yüzü ezilmiş ve bedeni fena hâlde yaralanmış. Asıl ölüm nedenini belirleyemeyecek kadar çok yara izi var. Muhtemelen katilin boğazını kesmesinin ardından ölmüş. Damarlarındaki tüm kanı böyle kaybetmiş. Haricî hiçbir mutasyon belirtisi bulunmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Klein snaps to attention:{/n} "Identifying the victim has proven impossible. His face has been smashed in and his body is badly maimed. There are too many wounds to determine the exact cause of death, but presumably he died after the killer slit his throat — that's how they drained his blood. No external signs of mutation were found."
